text:
Blaine was very warm and welcoming when I arrived.  The room listing was exactly as described on the listing and within about 10 minutes' drive of downtown. It was exactly what I needed, with some nice extras like the 'hidden chocolates' - see if you can find them :)

Got some advice from Blaine about what to check out on (college football)game day and to get there early!

I also got a great tip for breakfast the following day from Blaine's housemate - Veracruz, excellent breakfast burritos!

Thanks Blaine (and housemate) - I would stay again if I ever visited Austin!
title: Great Room Mins to Downtown
